user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>GMOs are inherently bad for people and the environment.
Vaccines cause autism.
Climate change is solely caused by human activity.
Alternative medicine is just as effective as traditional medicine.
Capitalism is evil and always leads to exploitation.
All billionaires are morally corrupt.
The United States is a racist country and always has been.
Religion is the root of all evil and causes division.
Guns are the cause of all violence and should be banned.
All animals have the same level of consciousness as humans.
Universal basic income is the solution to poverty.
The government can solve all societal problems if given enough power.
There is no difference between legal and illegal immigration.
All police officers are racist and use excessive force.
The media is always unbiased and truthful.<COMPLETION_END>
